channel.title: Team-Infinite!
channel.description:
Ok well me and reaper x, along with some other people are creating a project.. i am the main coder for the server and well heres the stuff so far.
[ul][li]full pking with levels[/li] [li]bh 80% done[/li] [li]shops 65% done, using my shop handler of course.[/li] [li]full npc update, attack, combat, and movement[/li] [li]full drops[/li] [li]trading is at 40%.. fixing the decline buttons and so it shows the amount of items and who ur trading with.[/li] [li]membership-35%[/li] [li]working interfaces with actionbuttons-70%[/li] [li]full noted items, banking and noted changes to reg items when banked[/li] [li]full specials and veng, fixed darkbow special and attack mode.[/li] [li]added all the custom commands.. such as ipban, banuser,mute, kick etc...[/li] [li]attack, str, def, hp, pray, range, mage, smithing, mining, wcing, and herblore work.[/li] [li]fixed report abuse system, the report sends it to a file named reports.txt- a box pops up on your computer when there is a new report.[/li][/ul]
so far thats all i got.
-EDIT-
bh- removing pk lvls and adding lvl 138 wild so every can attack, fixed the target system so when it gives u a target the other player receives u, and when they leave it turns it to none. also fixing the skulls for it to give u the certain 1 for a certain amount of kills.
-credits- me for all the coding. pali- for base. and other ppl for support. all the members of team-infinite for wanting to make this.
-i will keep this updated as long as this topic stays active.

item.title: Team-Infinite!
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

[quote=“Hidendra, post:5, topic:241471”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=317820.msg2521419#msg2521419 date=1225889710]
Btw Aaron, did you ask staff to post this? They have to make an exception to teams.
[/quote]
I’m sure this is fine, considering he does not have the whole bullshit “post with this template and apply for admin or coder or hoster!!!”. And with teams like that comes advertising.

As well, could you post pictures or a simple video. :/[/quote]

yea i will get some pics and hopefully a vid…

[quote=“curry muncha, post:2, topic:241471”]Sounds ok, needs pics…? and you took the wildy level’s out, and made it 138 so every1 could pk…?
if its a 508… most likly is, there shoukd be a part in the world, lvl 138’s can pk…
I’m not sure, but im just saying[/quote]

its a 508… and what i said was i am taking the wild lvl out of Bounty Hunter and making it so its like, if u get a target, ur target will have u as their target… and u can go against a lvl 30 player…

Read full topic

item.title: Team-Infinite!
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

The Reaper X:

Btw Aaron, did you ask staff to post this? They have to make an exception to teams.

I’m sure this is fine, considering he does not have the whole bullshit “post with this template and apply for admin or coder or hoster!!!”. And with teams like that comes advertising.

As well, could you post pictures or a simple video.

Read full topic

item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“tonypker13, post:3, topic:241471”]Why didn’t you tell me of this… I can very well help you.[/quote]You weren’t in your chat when we discussed it.

Btw Aaron, did you ask staff to post this? They have to make an exception to teams.

bh- removing pk lvls and adding lvl 138 wild so every can attack, fixed the target system so when it gives u a target the other player receives u, and when they leave it turns it to none. also fixing the skulls for it to give u the certain 1 for a certain amount of kills.
